titles.title: Honoring the life and legacy of Israeli Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on International Relations.

bill.summary: 11/7/1995--Introduced. Condemns the assassination of Israeli Prime Minister Yitzhak Rabin. Extends condolences to his family and to all the people of Israel. Expresses admiration for his historic contributions and support for the government of Acting Prime Minister Shimon Peres. Reaffirms a commitment to the process of building a just and lasting peace between Israel and its neighbors.
